Eirik Hearthwise.name: Eirik Hearthwise

classFeatures.name: Channel Divinity (2/rest)
classFeatures.description: You can now use your Channel Divinity twice between rests instead of once.

classFeatures.name: Destroy Undead (CR 1/2)
classFeatures.description: When an undead of CR 1/2 or lower fails its saving throw against your Turn Undead, it is instantly destroyed.

classFeatures.name: Divine Domain: Life
classFeatures.description: You gain proficiency with heavy armor. Bless and Cure Wounds are always prepared. Your healing spells heal additional hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level (Disciple of Life).

classFeatures.name: Preserve Life (Channel Divinity Option)
classFeatures.description: As an action, you can restore a total of HP equal to five times your cleric level (25 HP at level 5), divided among any creatures within 30 feet of you, not to heal a creature above half its hit point maximum.

classFeatures.name: Spellcasting
classFeatures.description: You can cast prepared cleric spells using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability. You can use a holy symbol as a spellcasting focus. Spell Save DC 14, Spell Attack +6.

racialTraits.name: Ability Score Increase
racialTraits.description: Your ability scores each increase by 1.

racialTraits.name: Extra Language
racialTraits.description: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.

backgroundFeature.name: Military Rank
backgroundFeature.description: You have a military rank from your career as a soldier. Soldiers loyal to your former military organization still recognize your authority and influence, and they defer to you if they are of a lower rank. Knowledge gained: The cleansing ritual involves bringing sunlight to the Stone, blessing it with pure water, and using the blade of sacrifice to break the curse.

Eirik Hearthwise.personality_traits: Cheerful and full of jokes to put others at ease, but this masks his deep grief over the loss of his previous unit. Sila's trust in Eirik and Kira has grown after the safe return of her chest, strengthening their reputation at the outpost.
Eirik Hearthwise.ideals: Redemption. Every life saved is a step toward atoning for the lives he failed to save.
Eirik Hearthwise.bonds: Carries a dog tag from his fallen unit as a constant reminder of his promise to protect others. Has earned Sila's continued support and access to her supplies following the recovery of her chest.
Eirik Hearthwise.flaws: Reckless in the face of danger, terrified of losing friends again and willing to take great risks to prevent it.

Ranger Thane.name: Ranger Thane

classFeatures.name: Action Surge
classFeatures.description: Allows the use of an additional action on your turn. Regained on a short or long rest.

classFeatures.name: Extra Attack
classFeatures.description: You can Attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on Your Turn.

classFeatures.name: Favored Enemy
classFeatures.description: Advantage on Survival checks to track favored enemies (humanoids: elves, humans); advantage on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.

classFeatures.name: Fighting Style (Archery)
classFeatures.description: +2 bonus to attack rolls you make with ranged weapons.

classFeatures.name: Natural Explorer
classFeatures.description: Forest: Double proficiency bonus for proficient skills when in favored terrain; ignore difficult terrain; cannot become lost except by magic; remain alert to danger while traveling; move stealthily at a normal pace when alone; find twice as much food when foraging; learn exact number, sizes, and how long ago creatures passed through area.

classFeatures.name: Ranger Archetype (Corrupted Hunter)
classFeatures.description: A twisted, corrupted path focusing on hunting and cursing victims.

classFeatures.name: Second Wind
classFeatures.description: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Regained on a short or long rest.

classFeatures.name: Spellcasting
classFeatures.description: Can cast ranger spells using Wisdom as spellcasting ability.

racialTraits.name: Darkvision
racialTraits.description: Can see in darkness up to 60 feet as if it were dim light.

racialTraits.name: Relentless Endurance
racialTraits.description: When reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, drop to 1 hit point instead (once per long rest).

racialTraits.name: Savage Attacks
racialTraits.description: When scoring a critical hit with a melee weapon, can roll one of the weapon’s damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

backgroundFeature.name: Wanderer
backgroundFeature.description: Has excellent memory for maps and geography, and can always recall the general layout of terrain, settlements, and other features. Can find food and fresh water for self and up to five others each day, provided the land offers berries, small game, water, and so forth. Recently helped recover clues: torn cloak piece and smuggler's lantern. Noted warnings left by smugglers on the tunnel wall and evidence of Elen's hurried passage.

Ranger Thane.personality_traits: Gruff, speaks little, haunted by visions of the wild. Witnessed the restoration of the Withered Hart. Received Keeper Morvath's counsel. Encouraged Eirik to accept the Keeper's task and stands ready to help restore the Lost Ward Circle.
Ranger Thane.ideals: Only the strong survive; the weak feed the corrupted woods. Reinforced resolve to defend the woods.
Ranger Thane.bonds: Owes allegiance to a dark spirit of the forest.
Ranger Thane.flaws: Quick to violence, trusts no one, sometimes loses control to the corruption.
